text:
The initial server response time is more than 2.5seconds, where HUBL only websites will almost load instantly. After you land on the page itself, navigation is kinda smooth so thats no real issue. Is React CMS serverless and do we have a cold start?

What are the policies for having a external worker pinging the HEAD of the website every 10 seconds to keep the website ‘warm’?

hi all! Ive been tasked with building a web app for one of our clients using the cms-react functionality, just wondering if anyone has built anything like this before using it? Any head up on potential pitfalls would be ace. Im new to the whole cms-react thing but not new to React. Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
